description.zh-cn: 新加坡的第一所高等学府，也是世界级顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: The first institution of higher learning in Singapore, and a world-class top research university.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学现任校长。
description.en: The current president of the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的国家元首职位，依惯例兼任新加坡国立大学校监。
description.en: The head of state of Singapore, who by convention serves as the Chancellor of the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 现任新加坡总统，兼任新加坡国立大学校监。
description.en: The current President of Singapore, who also serves as the Chancellor of the National University of Singapore.

description.en: A professor at Peking University and a former visiting professor at the National University of Singapore, who was investigated for allegations of academic fraud.

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology corporation.

description.zh-cn: 华为公司创始人。
description.en: Founder of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家，曾任新加坡国立大学博学计划院长。
description.en: Historian, former dean of the University Scholars Programme at the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡外交官与学者，曾任新加坡国立大学香灰莉木学院院长。
description.en: A Singaporean diplomat and academic, former rector of Tembusu College at the National University of Singapore.

nodes.id: 全球产学未来人才培养策略联盟

zh-cn: 全球产学未来人才培养策略联盟

description.zh-cn: 陈永财是新加坡国立大学的现任校长。
description.en: Tan Eng Chye is the current president of the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 尚达曼是现任新加坡总统。
description.en: Tharman Shanmugaratnam is the current President of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡总统依惯例兼任新加坡国立大学校监。
description.en: The President of Singapore serves as the Chancellor of the National University of Singapore by convention.

relationships.target: 英皇爱德华七世医学院

description.zh-cn: 1912年，海峡殖民地医学学校改名为英皇爱德华七世医学院。
description.en: In 1912, the Straits Settlements and Federated Malay States Government Medical School was renamed the King Edward VII College of Medicine.

relationships.source: 英皇爱德华七世医学院

description.zh-cn: 1949年，英皇爱德华七世医学院与莱佛士学院合并为马来亚大学。
description.en: In 1949, the King Edward VII College of Medicine merged with Raffles College to form the University of Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 1949年，莱佛士学院与英皇爱德华七世医学院合并为马来亚大学。
description.en: In 1949, Raffles College merged with the King Edward VII College of Medicine to form the University of Malaya.

description.zh-cn: 1962年，马来亚大学位于新加坡的校区独立为新加坡大学。
description.en: In 1962, the Singapore campus of the University of Malaya became independent as the University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，新加坡大学和南洋大学合并，校名定为新加坡国立大学。
description.en: In 1980, the University of Singapore and Nanyang University merged to form the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，南洋大学和新加坡大学合并，校名定为新加坡国立大学。
description.en: In 1980, Nanyang University and the University of Singapore merged to form the National University of Singapore.

relationships.target: 杜克-国大医学研究生学院

description.zh-cn: 2007年，新加坡国立大学与美国杜克大学联合创办了杜克-国大医学研究生学院。
description.en: In 2007, the National University of Singapore jointly founded the Duke-NUS Graduate Medical School with Duke University from the United States.

relationships.target: 杜克-国大医学研究生学院

description.zh-cn: 2007年，美国杜克大学与新加坡国立大学联合创办了杜克-国大医学研究生学院。
description.en: In 2007, Duke University from the United States jointly founded the Duke-NUS Graduate Medical School with the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 陈春华曾任新加坡国立大学商学院客座教授，后因学术造假指控被校方调查。
description.en: Chen Chun Hua was a visiting professor at the NUS Business School and was later investigated by the university over allegations of academic fraud.

description.zh-cn: 陈春华是北京大学的教授。
description.en: Chen Chun Hua is a professor at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 在陈春华被指控学术造假后，华为发表公开声明，驳斥她与公司及其创始人任正非的关系。
description.en: After Chen Chun Hua was accused of academic fraud, Huawei issued a public statement refuting her relationship with the company and its founder, Ren Zhengfei.

description.zh-cn: 盖兹基金会曾向新加坡国立大学提供多项研究资助，涉及疫苗研发、水资源处理、医疗设备、虹膜识别、结核病及新冠疫情应对等多个领域。
description.en: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation has provided multiple research grants to the National University of Singapore, covering areas such as vaccine development, water treatment, medical devices, iris recognition, tuberculosis, and COVID-19 response.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学与佐治亚理工学院合作成立了“亚太物流研究中心”，专注于物流领域的研究与教育。
description.en: The National University of Singapore collaborated with the Georgia Institute of Technology to establish 'The Logistics Institute – Asia Pacific', focusing on research and education in the field of logistics.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国立大学与圣路易斯华盛顿大学合作成立了跨大学研究中心“未来时代研究院”。
description.en: The National University of Singapore collaborated with Washington University in St. Louis to establish the cross-university research center 'Next Age Institute'.

position.en: Dean of the University Scholars Programme

description.zh-cn: 王赓武教授曾任新加坡国立大学博学计划的院长。
description.en: Professor Wang Gungwu was the dean of the University Scholars Programme at the National University of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: Tommy Koh教授曾任新加坡国立大学香灰莉木学院的院长。
description.en: Professor Tommy Koh was the rector of Tembusu College at the National University of Singapore.

relationships.target: 全球产学未来人才培养策略联盟
